extendedInfo.description: ï¼Completely New Pandora Design Update! KARA has finally arrived! Asia's most popular girl group is now on SHAKE Series! ï¼Download NOW and Check out all of their hit songs like 'Step', 'Jumping', 'Mr', and 'Lupin'! ï¼Tap & Shake to the music! KARA SHAKE offers traditional "TAPâstyle of gameplay as well as a new âSHAKE-WHEELâ mode, using a seamless-gesture technology developed by dooub. The âSHAKE-WHEELâ mode will make you feel like a DJ scratching the turntable! ï¼Introducing Card Deck System!KARA SHAKE rewards you cards when you complete a game. These cards can be collected, which include unreleased pictures of KARA, or they can be used in game like an item and receive higher scores! ï¼Be informed of special events and giveaways at: Twitter @MusicianSHAKE Facebook www.facebook.com/shakekara

reviews.title: Severe bug revealed
reviews.comment: Discovered a severe bug in the shake games I have played so far. In tap mode, when there are times we got to tap both notes simultaneously and the note at its right needs to slide to other notes later, the tap at the right will be freezed from sliding to other notes, causing irritating undeserving misses and I think many people will reguard this as lag. This especially noticeable in Kara\'s Binks song, where the part is something like \"single tap left and sliding tap at centre to left to right to left\"
reviews.author: Classisisimo Tertain-ment

reviews.title: Purchase problem
reviews.comment: I purchased the song pack and have been playing but after the update, the songs aren\'t available anymore. How is that fair? You can\'t expect us to make a purchase after every update

reviews.title: Unfair
reviews.comment: Are u all just greedy for money? Alot of the Shakes dont allow long play. Also,why is there more Shakes on iPhone and not on Android? Android has so few while iPhone has more variety. I suggest u stay fair and LET US PLAY LONG PLAY.
